description: Starts the workflow when a webhook is called

essential_properties.name: path
essential_properties.description: The path to listen to, dynamic values could be specified by using ':', e.g. 'your-path/:dynamic-value'. If dynamic values are set 'webhookId' would be prepended to path.

essential_properties.name: responseBinaryPropertyName
essential_properties.description: Name of the binary property to return
